motds.id: X-Force Outfit Bundle links to Item Shop
motds.title: X-Force Outfit Bundle
motds.body: Powered by a shrouded past, a twisted future, and a whole lot of luck.

motds.title: XP Xtravaganza Week 2
motds.body: Get the crew together and take on these party-wide challenges to finish out the Battle Pass strong!

motds.title: POWER UP WITH DISNEY+
motds.body: Get the squad together, sit back, and watch epic battles unfold with two months of Disney+ on us when you purchase V-Bucks, or make any real money purchase in the Item Shop, through December 31, 2020. New Disney+ subscribers aged 18+ only. Select countries only, offer varies by territory. Learn more at fortnite.com/disneyplus

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!
